tool_description: Detailed and accurate information for every country in the world (ISO 3166) in JSON format.
name: Countries
title: Countries

api_list.name: Get country data by ISO 3166 Alpha 3 code
api_list.description: Retrieve all fields for countries matching the provided Alpha 3 code(s).  Multiple Alpha 3 codes can be provided separated by commas.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://countries33.p.rapidapi.com/alpha3/NOR,CHE"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "countries33.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://countries33.p.rapidapi.com/alpha3/{alpha3}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "countries33.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get country data by time zone
api_list.description: Retrieve all fields for countries in the given time zone(s).  Multiple time zones can be provided separated by commas.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://countries33.p.rapidapi.com/timezone/UTC-05:00,UTC+03:00"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "countries33.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get basic country data
api_list.description: Retrieve name, state name, capital, ISO 3166, UN geoscheme, and population fields for all available countries.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://countries33.p.rapidapi.com/basic"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "countries33.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get country data by UN geoscheme region

api_list.name: Get country data by ISO 3166 Numeric code

api_list.name: Search countries by capital
api_list.description: Retrieve all fields for countries matching the provided capital.  For countries that have more than one capital, all capitals are searched.  Partial and full name searches are accepted.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://countries33.p.rapidapi.com/capital/San"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "countries33.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://countries33.p.rapidapi.com/capital/{capital}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "countries33.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search countries by name
api_list.description: Retrieve all fields for countries matching the provided Name.  Name and state name fields are searched.  Partial and full name searches are accepted.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://countries33.p.rapidapi.com/name/Bel"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "countries33.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
